ygData.subject: RE: Maestro of Rancor
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a six note blade pretty recently (same stats as evensong).  I prefer it to my yaks, mainly because level 50+ stuff (which is about all I seem to fight
ygData.messageBody:
I got a six note blade pretty recently (same stats as evensong). I prefer
it to my yaks, mainly because level 50+ stuff (which is about all I seem to
fight anymore) resists the yak proc too much. I'll either go for a six note
blade/gold koshigitana combo, or six note/orb of tishan combo depending on
whether or not an enchanter is handy.
Max damage with six note blade so far = 51.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, January 10, 2000 10:50 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Maestro of Rancor


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>


Maestro of Rancor dropped the Evensong on Saturday night. Second
one on our server to my knowledge. I know the bard with the first
drop.

Members of the Pantheon killed him after they themselves had perished
twice to the bugger and us once. I swear the guy was doing donuts
around the plane looking for people to kill. That, and the 4 mob
train he was carrying around with him didn't help.

Needless to say, I was the only bard on the plane at the time.
Unfortunately, I have to wait until Maestro drops another, since
the weapon was 'accidentally' looted by someone who cannot use it.
<sigh>

Do you use your evensong over your yk, Shada?

Harmonic.
